AbsoluteZero.title: Absolute Zero
AbsoluteZero.powers: {AbsoluteZero} deals himself 1 Cold Damage. Play an Equipment card. If you do not, destroy one of your Equipment cards. Draw 2 Cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Sorry, I don't have a cold pun in storage right now.

TheArgentAdept.title: The Argent Adept
TheArgentAdept.powers: Play a card. Activate that card's [u]perform[/u] text. Activate that card's [u]accompany[/u] text.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I wonder if I can carry a tune all the way through this...

Benchmark.title: Benchmark
Benchmark.powers: Play a Software card. Until the end of your next turn, that Software is indestructible. {Benchmark} deals 1 Target Lightning Damage equal to the number of Software cards in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Bunker.title: Bunker
Bunker.powers: Draw 2 cards. Discard a card for each of your other cards with powers in play. This turn, you may use as many powers as you have cards with powers in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

CaptainCosmic.title: Captain Cosmic
CaptainCosmic.powers: Select a Construct Target. Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to that Construct to 1 and redirect any damage that would be dealt to a Target next to the construct to that Construct. If there are no construct targets, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

ChronoRanger.title: Chrono-Ranger
ChronoRanger.powers: Draw a card. Until the end of your next turn, damage dealt to and by {ChronoRanger} is irreducible.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Expatriette.title: Expatriette
Expatriette.powers: Until the end of the turn, reduce damage dealt by {Expatriette} by 1. Play the top card of your deck. You may use an additional power this turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I've brought the whole arsenal this time.

Knyfe.title: K.N.Y.F.E.
Knyfe.powers: Draw a card. Until the end of your next turn, when {Knyfe} deals themselves damage, they Regain 1 HP.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: A chance to take a few more risks, eh?

MrFixer.title: Mr. Fixer
MrFixer.powers: {MrFixer} deals 1 Target 1 Melee Damage and himself 0 Melee Damage. Play a Tool card. If you do not, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Tool card, play it, and shuffle the other cards revealed this way into your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: This seems like the right time to strike.

NightMist.title: NightMist
NightMist.powers: Until the end of your next turn, when {NightMist} would deal a hero target damage, reduce that damage by 1. Draw a card or play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Let's see if I can practice what I teach.

OmnitronX.title: Omnitron-X
OmnitronX.powers: Until the start of your next turn, your Components are indestructible. {OmnitronX} deals 1 Target and themselves Lightning Damage equal to the number of your Components in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Parse.title: Parse
Parse.powers: Look at the top card a non-Hero Deck. {Parse} deals up to 1 Target damage equal to the number of cards in that Deck's Trash. If damage is dealt this way, shuffle that Trash into that Deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Tachyon.title: Tachyon
Tachyon.powers: Play the top card of your Trash. Move the top card of your Trash to the bottom of your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
